document_data.name: Old Knot Shop
document_data.mainbody: The '''Old Knot Shop''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Old Knot Shop was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the east side of the [[Street of the Sword]] north of [[Buckle Alley]].
document_data.Services: The shop specialized in gear for [[adventurer]]s.
